greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = numerator of (n-6)/(2n)
comment: 2 Cos[2*Pi/n] is root of polynomial of degree = EulerPhi[n]/2 = A000010(n)/2 = A023022(n).
Records in this sequence are congruent to 1 or 5 mod 6 (see A007310).
First occurrence n in this sequence see A146308.
results.author: _Artur Jasinski_, Oct 29 2008
